definition: immoderately desirous of acquiring e.g. wealth, the act of gripping something firmly with the hands (or the tentacles)
details:
adjective
- immoderately desirous of acquiring e.g. wealth
= synonyms: greedy
noun
- the act of gripping something firmly with the hands (or the tentacles)
= synonyms: taking hold
- understanding with difficulty
= example: understanding with difficulty
